title: The Gravy Train
description: Finn Keane is a novice investment banker who helps an aging Chairman try to buy his company back, while the ruthless Wall Street sharks who drove it into bankruptcy do all they can to stop them so the Wall Streeters can carve it up for themselves.Excerpts from Trojan Horse, Bull Street and Vaccine Nation , David Lender's other thrillers, follow the text of The Gravy Train.
author: David Lender
